statements: DELETE FROM natural_disasters WHERE disaster_type = 'Earthquake' AND impact_severity > 5;
DELETE FROM natural_disasters WHERE disaster_id = 100 AND disaster_type = 'Earthquake';
DELETE FROM natural_disasters WHERE impact_severity > 5 AND date_occurred < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM natural_disasters WHERE id = 5 AND location = 'California';
DELETE FROM disaster_impact WHERE factor = 'Economic' AND disaster_id IN (SELECT id FROM natural_disasters WHERE severity = 'High');
DELETE FROM DisasterAffectingPopulation WHERE population_size > 10000 AND displaced_count < 2000;
DELETE FROM population_density WHERE location = 'City A';
DELETE FROM spatial_distribution WHERE disaster_id = 101 AND latitude < 40.0;
